lines.text: our sincere congratulations to judge Gregory Von Klingen...
Alright, now stop pretending you can read, let me have a look at that.
You may be satisfied, not me!
In my great generosity I'll permit you fifteen minutes to go up to your room and masturbate.

[about her sister Veronica]
Dad made her wear a short nighty all the time, so her bottom was always available for him to fondle.
Friederike said that I could speak to you freely, Veronica, because you open up easily.
We have to celebrate our victory. We can have some burgundy, champagne, or...
At last we can love each other freely without being afraid of anybody other.
